CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW AD_WINDOW_V AS SELECT w.AD_Window_ID AS AD_Window_ID, u.AD_Client_ID AS AD_Client_ID, u.AD_Role_ID AS UserDef_Role_ID, u.AD_User_ID AS AD_User_ID, u.AD_UserDef_Win_ID AS AD_UserDef_Win_ID, u.CustomizationName AS CustomizationName, w.Name AS Name, COALESCE(u.Name,w.DisplayName) AS Name2 , COALESCE(u.Description,w.Description) AS Description, COALESCE(u.Help,w.Help) AS Help, w.WindowType AS WindowType, w.AD_Color_ID AS AD_Color_ID, w.AD_Image_ID AS AD_Image_ID, COALESCE(u.WinHeight,w.WinHeight) AS WinHeight, COALESCE(u.WinWidth,w.WinWidth) AS WinWidth, w.AD_CtxArea_ID AS AD_CtxArea_ID, COALESCE( (SELECT IsSOTrx FROM AD_CtxArea ctx WHERE w.AD_CtxArea_ID=ctx.AD_CtxArea_ID ),'Y') AS IsSOTrx, a.AD_Role_ID AS AD_Role_ID, a.IsReadWrite AS IsReadWrite, w.IsDefault AS IsDefault, wa.IsAppointment AS IsAppointment, wa.IsTask AS IsTask, wa.IsEmail AS IsEmail, wa.IsLetter AS IsLetter, wa.IsSms AS IsSms, wa.IsFaxEmail AS IsFaxEmail, wa.isChat as IsChat, wa.isAttachment as isAttachment, wa.IsHistory as IsHistory, wa.IsCheckRequest as IsCheckRequest, wa.isCopyRecord as isCopyRecord, wa.IsSubscribeRecord as IsSubscribeRecord, wa.IsZoomAcross as IsZoomAcross, wa.iSCreateDocument as iSCreateDocument, wa.IsUploadDocument as IsUploadDocument, wa.IsViewDocument as IsViewDocument, wa.IsAttachDocumentFrom as IsAttachDocumentFrom, wa.IsImportMap as IsImportMap, wa.IsMarkToExport as IsMarkToExport, wa.IsArchive as IsArchive, wa.IsAttachEmail as IsAttachEmail, wa.IsRoleCenterView as IsRoleCenterView, wa.Action1 as Action1, wa.Action2 as Action2 FROM AD_Window w INNER JOIN AD_Window_Access a ON (w.AD_Window_ID=a.AD_Window_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Win u ON (w.AD_Window_ID=u.AD_Window_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_WindowAction wa ON (w.AD_Window_ID=wa.AD_Window_ID) WHERE w.IsActive ='Y' AND a.IsActive ='Y'

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW AD_WINDOW_VT AS SELECT trl.AD_Language AS AD_Language, w.AD_Window_ID AS AD_Window_ID, u.AD_Client_ID AS AD_Client_ID, u.AD_Role_ID AS UserDef_Role_ID, u.AD_User_ID AS AD_User_ID, u.AD_UserDef_Win_ID AS AD_UserDef_Win_ID, u.CustomizationName AS CustomizationName, w.Name AS Name, COALESCE(u.Name,trl.Name) AS Name2, COALESCE(u.Description,trl.Description) AS Description, COALESCE(u.Help,trl.Help) AS Help, w.WindowType AS WindowType, w.AD_Color_ID AS AD_Color_ID, w.AD_Image_ID AS AD_Image_ID, COALESCE(u.WinHeight,w.WinHeight) AS WinHeight, COALESCE(u.WinWidth,w.WinWidth) AS WinWidth, w.AD_CtxArea_ID AS AD_CtxArea_ID, COALESCE( (SELECT IsSOTrx FROM AD_CtxArea ctx WHERE w.AD_CtxArea_ID=ctx.AD_CtxArea_ID ),'Y') AS IsSOTrx, a.AD_Role_ID AS AD_Role_ID, a.IsReadWrite AS IsReadWrite, w.IsDefault AS IsDefault, wa.IsAppointment AS IsAppointment, wa.IsTask AS IsTask, wa.IsEmail AS IsEmail, wa.IsLetter AS IsLetter, wa.IsSms AS IsSms, wa.IsFaxEmail AS IsFaxEmail, wa.isChat as IsChat, wa.isAttachment as isAttachment, wa.IsHistory as IsHistory, wa.IsCheckRequest as IsCheckRequest, wa.isCopyRecord as isCopyRecord, wa.IsSubscribeRecord as IsSubscribeRecord, wa.IsZoomAcross as IsZoomAcross, wa.iSCreateDocument as iSCreateDocument, wa.IsUploadDocument as IsUploadDocument, wa.IsViewDocument as IsViewDocument, wa.IsAttachDocumentFrom as IsAttachDocumentFrom, wa.IsImportMap as IsImportMap, wa.IsMarkToExport as IsMarkToExport, wa.IsArchive as IsArchive, wa.IsAttachEmail as IsAttachEmail, wa.IsRoleCenterView as IsRoleCenterView, wa.Action1 as Action1, wa.Action2 as Action2 FROM AD_Window w INNER JOIN AD_Window_Trl trl ON (w.AD_Window_ID=trl.AD_Window_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Window_Access a ON (w.AD_Window_ID=a.AD_Window_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Win u ON (w.AD_Window_ID=u.AD_Window_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_WindowAction wa ON (w.AD_Window_ID=wa.AD_Window_ID) WHERE w.IsActive ='Y' AND a.IsActive ='Y'

@SQL=ALTER TABLE AD_ModuleMenuFolder ADD SeqNo NUMBER(10,0) DEFAULT 9999 @SQL=ALTER TABLE AD_ModuleForm ADD SeqNo NUMBER(10,0) DEFAULT 9999 @SQL=ALTER TABLE AD_ModuleWindow ADD SeqNo NUMBER(10,0) DEFAULT 9999 @SQL=ALTER TABLE AD_ModuleProcess ADD SeqNo NUMBER(10,0) DEFAULT 9999
Update AD_Menu set IsActive='N' WHERE Export_ID='VIS_1000249'

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW AD_FIELD_V AS SELECT t.AD_Window_ID AS AD_Window_ID, f.AD_Tab_ID AS AD_Tab_ID, f.AD_Field_ID AS AD_Field_ID, tbl.AD_Table_ID AS AD_Table_ID, f.AD_Column_ID AS AD_Column_ID, f.ZOOMWINDOW_ID AS ZOOMWINDOW_ID, f.AD_InfoWindow_ID, uw.AD_Role_ID AS UserDef_Role_ID, uw.AD_User_ID AS AD_User_ID, uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID AS AD_UserDef_Win_ID, uw.CustomizationName AS CustomizationName, u.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID AS AD_UserDef_Tab_ID, u.AD_UserDef_Field_ID AS AD_UserDef_Field_ID, COALESCE(u.Name,f.Name) AS Name, COALESCE(u.Description,f.Description) AS Description, COALESCE(u.Help,f.Help) AS Help, COALESCE(u.IsDisplayed,f.IsDisplayed) AS IsDisplayed, COALESCE(u.MRIsDisplayed,f.MRISDisplayed, f.IsDisplayed) AS MRIsDisplayed, COALESCE(u.DisplayLogic,f.DisplayLogic) AS DisplayLogic, COALESCE(u.DisplayLength,f.DisplayLength) AS DisplayLength, COALESCE(u.SeqNo,f.SeqNo) AS SeqNo, COALESCE(u.SortNo,f.SortNo) AS SortNo, COALESCE(u.IsSameLine,f.IsSameLine) AS IsSameLine, f.IsHeading AS IsHeading, f.IsFieldOnly AS IsFieldOnly, f.IsReadOnly AS IsReadOnly, f.IsEncrypted AS IsEncryptedField, f.ObscureType AS ObscureType, f.IsDefaultFocus AS IsDefaultFocus, COALESCE(u.MRSeqNo,f.MRSeqNo) AS MRSeqNo, c.ColumnName AS ColumnName, c.ColumnSQL AS ColumnSQL, c.FieldLength AS FieldLength, c.VFormat AS VFormat, COALESCE(u.DefaultValue,COALESCE(f.DefaultValue,c.DefaultValue)) AS DefaultValue, c.IsKey AS IsKey, c.IsParent AS IsParent, c.IsMandatory AS IsMandatory, c.MandatoryLogic AS MandatoryLogic, COALESCE(COALESCE(u.IsMandatoryUI,f.IsMandatoryUI),c.IsMandatoryUI) AS IsMandatoryUI, c.IsIdentifier AS IsIdentifier, c.IsTranslated AS IsTranslated, c.AD_Reference_Value_ID AS AD_Reference_Value_ID, c.Callout AS Callout, c.IsCallout AS IsCallout, COALESCE(f.AD_Reference_ID,c.AD_Reference_ID) AS AD_Reference_ID, c.AD_Val_Rule_ID AS AD_Val_Rule_ID, c.AD_Process_ID AS AD_Process_ID, c.IsAlwaysUpdateable AS IsAlwaysUpdateable, c.ReadOnlyLogic AS ReadOnlyLogic, c.IsUpdateable AS IsUpdateable, c.IsEncrypted AS IsEncryptedColumn, COALESCE(u.IsSelectionColumn,c.IsSelectionColumn) AS IsSelectionColumn, COALESCE(u.SelectionSeqNo,c.SelectionSeqNo) AS SelectionSeqNo, COALESCE(u.IsSummaryColumn,c.IsSummaryColumn) AS IsSummaryColumn, COALESCE(u.SummarySeqNo,c.SummarySeqNo) AS SummarySeqNo, tbl.TableName AS TableName, COALESCE(u.ValueMin,c.ValueMin) AS ValueMin, COALESCE(u.ValueMax,c.ValueMax) AS ValueMax, fg.Name AS FieldGroup, vr.Code AS ValidationCode, c.IsLink AS ISLINK , C.IsRightPaneLink AS ISRIGHTPANELINK, f.MOBILELISTINGFORMAT AS MOBILELISTINGFORMAT, COALESCE(f.IsCopy,c.IsCopy) as IsCopy,c.AD_Form_ID,f.ColumnWidth FROM AD_Field f INNER JOIN AD_Tab t ON (f.AD_Tab_ID = t.AD_Tab_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_FieldGroup fg ON (f.AD_FieldGroup_ID = fg.AD_FieldGroup_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_Column c ON (f.AD_Column_ID = c.AD_Column_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Table tbl ON (c.AD_Table_ID = tbl.AD_Table_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Reference r ON (c.AD_Reference_ID = r.AD_Reference_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_Val_Rule vr ON (c.AD_Val_Rule_ID=vr.AD_Val_Rule_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Field u ON (f.AD_Field_ID=u.AD_Field_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Tab ut ON (ut.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID=u.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Win uw ON (uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID=ut.AD_UserDef_Win_ID) WHERE f.IsActive = 'Y' AND c.IsActive = 'Y'

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW AD_FIELD_VT AS SELECT trl.AD_Language AS AD_Language, t.AD_Window_ID AS AD_Window_ID, f.AD_Tab_ID AS AD_Tab_ID, f.AD_Field_ID AS AD_Field_ID, tbl.AD_Table_ID AS AD_Table_ID, f.AD_Column_ID AS AD_Column_ID, f.ZoomWindow_ID AS ZoomWindow_ID, f.AD_InfoWindow_ID, uw.AD_Role_ID AS UserDef_Role_ID, uw.AD_User_ID AS AD_User_ID, uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID AS AD_UserDef_Win_ID, uw.CustomizationName AS CustomizationName, u.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID AS AD_UserDef_Tab_ID, u.AD_UserDef_Field_ID AS AD_UserDef_Field_ID, COALESCE(u.Name,trl.Name) AS Name, COALESCE(u.Description,trl.Description) AS Description, COALESCE(u.Help,trl.Help) AS Help, COALESCE(u.IsDisplayed,f.IsDisplayed) AS IsDisplayed, COALESCE(u.MRIsDisplayed,f.MRIsDisplayed, f.IsDisplayed) AS MRIsDisplayed, COALESCE(u.DisplayLogic,f.DisplayLogic) AS DisplayLogic, COALESCE(u.DisplayLength,f.DisplayLength) AS DisplayLength, COALESCE(u.SeqNo,f.SeqNo) AS SeqNo, COALESCE(u.SortNo,f.SortNo) AS SortNo, COALESCE(u.IsSameLine,f.IsSameLine) AS IsSameLine, f.IsHeading AS IsHeading, f.IsFieldOnly AS IsFieldOnly, f.IsReadOnly AS IsReadOnly, f.IsEncrypted AS IsEncryptedField, f.ObscureType AS ObscureType, f.IsDefaultFocus AS IsDefaultFocus, COALESCE(u.MRSeqNo,f.MRSeqNo) AS MRSeqNo, c.ColumnName AS ColumnName, c.ColumnSQL AS ColumnSQL, c.FieldLength AS FieldLength, c.VFormat AS VFormat, COALESCE(u.DefaultValue,COALESCE(f.DefaultValue,c.DefaultValue)) AS DefaultValue, c.IsKey AS IsKey, c.IsParent AS IsParent, c.IsMandatory AS IsMandatory, c.MandatoryLogic AS MandatoryLogic, COALESCE(COALESCE(u.IsMandatoryUI,f.IsMandatoryUI),c.IsMandatoryUI) AS IsMandatoryUI, c.IsIdentifier AS IsIdentifier, c.IsTranslated AS IsTranslated, c.AD_Reference_Value_ID AS AD_Reference_Value_ID, c.Callout AS Callout, c.IsCallout AS IsCallout, COALESCE(f.AD_Reference_ID,c.AD_Reference_ID) AS AD_Reference_ID, c.AD_Val_Rule_ID AS AD_Val_Rule_ID, c.AD_Process_ID AS AD_Process_ID, c.IsAlwaysUpdateable AS IsAlwaysUpdateable, c.ReadOnlyLogic AS ReadOnlyLogic, c.IsUpdateable AS IsUpdateable, c.IsEncrypted AS IsEncryptedColumn, COALESCE(u.IsSelectionColumn,c.IsSelectionColumn) AS IsSelectionColumn, COALESCE(u.SelectionSeqNo,c.SelectionSeqNo) AS SelectionSeqNo, COALESCE(u.IsSummaryColumn,c.IsSummaryColumn) AS IsSummaryColumn, COALESCE(u.SummarySeqNo,c.SummarySeqNo) AS SummarySeqNo, tbl.TableName AS TableName, COALESCE(u.ValueMin,c.ValueMin) AS ValueMin, COALESCE(u.ValueMax,c.ValueMax) AS ValueMax, fgt.Name AS FieldGroup, vr.Code AS ValidationCode, c.IsLink AS ISLINK , C.IsRightPaneLink AS ISRIGHTPANELINK, f.MOBILELISTINGFORMAT AS MOBILELISTINGFORMAT, COALESCE(f.IsCopy,c.IsCopy) as IsCopy , c.AD_Form_ID , f.ColumnWidth FROM AD_Field f INNER JOIN AD_Field_Trl trl ON (f.AD_Field_ID = trl.AD_Field_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Tab t ON (f.AD_Tab_ID = t.AD_Tab_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_FieldGroup_Trl fgt ON (f.AD_FieldGroup_ID = fgt.AD_FieldGroup_ID AND trl.AD_Language =fgt.AD_Language) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_Column c ON (f.AD_Column_ID = c.AD_Column_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Table tbl ON (c.AD_Table_ID = tbl.AD_Table_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Reference r ON (c.AD_Reference_ID = r.AD_Reference_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_Val_Rule vr ON (c.AD_Val_Rule_ID=vr.AD_Val_Rule_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Field u ON (f.AD_Field_ID=u.AD_Field_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Tab ut ON (ut.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID=u.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Win uw ON (uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID=ut.AD_UserDef_Win_ID) WHERE f.IsActive = 'Y' AND c.IsActive = 'Y'
Alter table AD_Field ADD MRIsDisplayed CHAR(1)
Alter table AD_UserDef_Field ADD MRIsDisplayed CHAR(1)
ALTER TABLE AD_ModuleWindow ADD CreateTabsAndFields char(10)
ALTER TABLE AD_ModuleTab ADD CreateFields char(10)
ALTER TABLE M_Manufacturer ADD CONSTRAINT UPC_UniqueMan UNIQUE (UPC)
ALTER TABLE M_Product ADD CONSTRAINT UPC_UniquePrd UNIQUE (UPC)
ALTER TABLE C_UOM_Conversion ADD CONSTRAINT UPC_UniqueUom UNIQUE (UPC)

create or replace FUNCTION UpcUnique( window IN CHAR, Upcode IN VARCHAR2) RETURN NUMBER AS ProductID NUMBER; BEGIN IF (window = 'p') THEN SELECT M_Product_ID INTO ProductID FROM (SELECT p.M_Product_ID FROM M_Product p LEFT JOIN M_Manufacturer m ON m.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN M_ProductAttributes a ON a.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN C_UOM_Conversion c ON c.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID WHERE m.UPC = Upcode OR a.UPC = Upcode OR c.UPC = Upcode ) t1 WHERE rownum=1; ELSIF (window = 'm') THEN SELECT M_Product_ID INTO ProductID FROM (SELECT p.M_Product_ID FROM M_Product p LEFT JOIN M_Manufacturer m ON m.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN M_ProductAttributes a ON a.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN C_UOM_Conversion c ON c.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID WHERE p.UPC = Upcode OR a.UPC = Upcode OR c.UPC = Upcode ) t1 WHERE rownum=1; ELSIF (window = 'a') THEN SELECT M_Product_ID INTO ProductID FROM (SELECT p.M_Product_ID FROM M_Product p LEFT JOIN M_Manufacturer m ON m.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN M_ProductAttributes a ON a.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN C_UOM_Conversion c ON c.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID WHERE p.UPC = Upcode OR m.UPC = Upcode OR c.UPC = Upcode ) t1 WHERE rownum=1; ELSE SELECT M_Product_ID INTO ProductID FROM (SELECT p.M_Product_ID FROM M_Product p LEFT JOIN M_Manufacturer m ON m.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN M_ProductAttributes a ON a.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID LEFT JOIN C_UOM_Conversion c ON c.M_Product_ID = p.M_Product_ID WHERE p.UPC = Upcode OR m.UPC = Upcode OR a.UPC = Upcode ) t1 WHERE rownum=1; END IF; RETURN ProductID; END UpcUnique;
ALTER TABLE AD_Tab ADD ShowSummaryLevelNodes char(1)

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW AD_TAB_V AS SELECT t.AD_Tab_ID AS AD_Tab_ID,t.AD_Window_ID AS AD_Window_ID,t.AD_Table_ID AS AD_Table_ID,t.AD_CtxArea_ID AS AD_CtxArea_ID,uw.AD_Role_ID AS UserDef_Role_ID,uw.AD_User_ID AS AD_User_ID,uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID AS AD_UserDef_Win_ID,uw.CustomizationName AS CustomizationName,u.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID AS AD_UserDef_Tab_ID,COALESCE(u.Name,t.Name) AS Name,COALESCE(u.Description,t.Description) AS Description,COALESCE(u.Help,t.Help) AS Help,COALESCE(u.SeqNo,t.SeqNo) AS SeqNo, COALESCE(u.IsSingleRow,t.IsSingleRow) AS IsSingleRow, t.HasTree AS HasTree, t.IsInfoTab AS IsInfoTab, t.Referenced_Tab_ID AS Referenced_Tab_ID, tbl.ReplicationType AS ReplicationType, tbl.TableName AS TableName, tbl.AccessLevel AS AccessLevel, tbl.IsSecurityEnabled AS IsSecurityEnabled, tbl.IsDeleteable AS IsDeleteable, tbl.IsHighVolume AS IsHighVolume, tbl.IsView AS IsView, t.IsTranslationTab AS IsTranslationTab, COALESCE(u.IsReadOnly,t.IsReadOnly) AS IsReadOnly, t.AD_Image_ID AS AD_Image_ID, t.TabLevel AS TabLevel, t.WhereClause AS WhereClause,t.OrderByClause AS OrderByClause,t.CommitWarning AS CommitWarning,COALESCE(u.ReadOnlyLogic,t.ReadOnlyLogic) AS ReadOnlyLogic,COALESCE(u.IsDisplayed,t.IsDisplayed) AS IsDisplayed,COALESCE(u.DisplayLogic,t.DisplayLogic) AS DisplayLogic,t.AD_Column_ID AS AD_Column_ID,c.ColumnName AS LinkColumnName,t.AD_Process_ID AS AD_Process_ID,t.IsSortTab AS IsSortTab, t.IsAdvancedTab AS IsAdvancedTab,COALESCE(u.IsInsertRecord,t.IsInsertRecord) AS IsInsertRecord,t.AD_ColumnSortOrder_ID AS AD_ColumnSortOrder_ID,t.AD_ColumnSortYesNo_ID AS AD_ColumnSortYesNo_ID,t.Included_Tab_ID AS Included_Tab_ID,t.ShowSummaryLevelNodes FROM AD_Tab t INNER JOIN AD_Table tbl ON (t.AD_Table_ID = tbl.AD_Table_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_Column c ON (t.AD_Column_ID=c.AD_Column_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Tab u ON (u.AD_Tab_ID=t.AD_Tab_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Win uw ON (uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID=u.AD_UserDef_Win_ID) WHERE t.IsActive ='Y' AND tbl.IsActive ='Y'

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW AD_TAB_VT AS SELECT trl.AD_Language AS AD_Language, t.AD_Tab_ID AS AD_Tab_ID,t.AD_Window_ID AS AD_Window_ID, t.AD_Table_ID AS AD_Table_ID, t.AD_CtxArea_ID AS AD_CtxArea_ID, uw.AD_Role_ID AS UserDef_Role_ID, uw.AD_User_ID AS AD_User_ID, uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID AS AD_UserDef_Win_ID, uw.CustomizationName AS CustomizationName, u.AD_UserDef_Tab_ID AS AD_UserDef_Tab_ID, COALESCE(u.Name,trl.Name) AS Name, COALESCE(u.Description,trl.Description) AS Description, COALESCE(u.Help,trl.Help) AS Help, COALESCE(u.SeqNo,t.SeqNo) AS SeqNo, COALESCE(u.IsSingleRow,t.IsSingleRow) AS IsSingleRow, t.HasTree AS HasTree,t.IsInfoTab AS IsInfoTab, t.Referenced_Tab_ID AS Referenced_Tab_ID, tbl.ReplicationType AS ReplicationType, tbl.TableName AS TableName, tbl.AccessLevel AS AccessLevel, tbl.IsSecurityEnabled AS IsSecurityEnabled, tbl.IsDeleteable AS IsDeleteable, tbl.IsHighVolume AS IsHighVolume, tbl.IsView AS IsView, t.IsTranslationTab AS IsTranslationTab, COALESCE(u.IsReadOnly,t.IsReadOnly) AS IsReadOnly, t.AD_Image_ID AS AD_Image_ID, t.TabLevel AS TabLevel, t.WhereClause AS WhereClause, t.OrderByClause AS OrderByClause, t.CommitWarning AS CommitWarning, COALESCE(u.ReadOnlyLogic,t.ReadOnlyLogic) AS ReadOnlyLogic, COALESCE(u.IsDisplayed,t.IsDisplayed) AS IsDisplayed, COALESCE(u.DisplayLogic,t.DisplayLogic) AS DisplayLogic, t.AD_Column_ID AS AD_Column_ID, c.ColumnName AS LinkColumnName, t.AD_Process_ID AS AD_Process_ID, t.IsSortTab AS IsSortTab, t.IsAdvancedTab AS IsAdvancedTab, COALESCE(u.IsInsertRecord,t.IsInsertRecord) AS IsInsertRecord, t.AD_ColumnSortOrder_ID AS AD_ColumnSortOrder_ID, t.AD_ColumnSortYesNo_ID AS AD_ColumnSortYesNo_ID, t.Included_Tab_ID AS Included_Tab_ID, t.ShowSummaryLevelNodes FROM AD_Tab t INNER JOIN AD_Tab_Trl trl ON (t.AD_Tab_ID = trl.AD_Tab_ID) INNER JOIN AD_Table tbl ON (t.AD_Table_ID = tbl.AD_Table_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_Column c ON (t.AD_Column_ID=c.AD_Column_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Tab u ON (u.AD_Tab_ID=t.AD_Tab_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN AD_UserDef_Win uw ON (uw.AD_UserDef_Win_ID=u.AD_UserDef_Win_ID) WHERE t.IsActive ='Y' AND tbl.IsActive ='Y'

create or replace FUNCTION GetParentNode( NodeID IN NUMBER, tableName IN VARCHAR2, treeID IN NUMBER) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS parentID NUMBER:=0; tabName VARCHAR2(1000); BEGIN tabName:=tableName; tabname:='select nvl(( select parent_ID from '||tabName||' WHERE NODE_ID='||NodeID||' AND AD_Tree_ID='||treeID||' AND IsActive=''Y''),0) as parent_ID from dual'; EXECUTE IMMEDIATE tabName INTO parentID; RETURN parentID; END;

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION GetTreeNodePaths( nodeID IN NUMBER, adlanguage IN VARCHAR2, nodeTableName IN VARCHAR2, recordTableName IN VARCHAR2, recordKeyCol IN VARCHAR2 , treeID IN NUMBER) RETURN VARCHAR2 AS path VARCHAR2(1000); proName VARCHAR(500); parentID NUMBER; node_ID NUMBER; tabName VARCHAR(500); BEGIN node_ID :=nodeID; WHILE node_ID>0 LOOP IF adlanguage='en_US' THEN tabName :=' SELECT Name FROM '||recordTableName||' WHERE '||recordKeyCol||'='||node_ID ; ELSE tabName:=' SELECT Name FROM '||recordTableName||'_Trl WHERE '||recordKeyCol||'='||node_ID ||' AND AD_Language='''||adlanguage||''''; END IF; EXECUTE IMMEDIATE tabName INTO proName; path := proName||'\'|| path; parentID :=getparentnode(node_ID,nodeTableName,treeID); node_ID :=parentID; END LOOP; RETURN path; END;
ALTER TABLE C_TeamMember ADD CONSTRAINT C_TeamMember_User UNIQUE (AD_User_ID, C_Team_ID)

CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE setUniqueuserValue AS quer varchar(2000); BEGIN FOR CUR_VAR IN ( SELECT t1.AD_User_ID, t1.value FROM AD_User t1, AD_User t2 WHERE t1.AD_User_ID <> t2.AD_User_ID AND t1.Value = t2.Value GROUP BY t1.AD_User_ID, t1.value) LOOP quer:= 'UPDATE AD_User SET value=value || (SELECT COUNT(AD_User_ID) FROM AD_User WHERE Value='''||CUR_VAR.value||''') WHERE AD_User_ID='||CUR_VAR.AD_User_ID; execute immediate quer; END LOOP ; END;
BEGIN SETUNIQUEUSERVALUE(); Commit; END;
alter table AD_User ADD unique (Value)
Alter table AD_Column Add (AD_Form_ID number(10))
Alter table AD_PInstance_Para Add (AD_PROCESS_PARA_ID number(10))
ALTER TABLE AD_Field ADD ColumnWidth Number(10) DEFAULT 100
ALTER TABLE AD_Process ADD AD_ReportMaster_ID Number(10)
Update AD_Field set ColumnWidth =100 where ColumnWidth is null
ALTER TABLE AD_Process ADD AD_ReportMaster_ID Number(10)
ALTER TABLE AppointmentsInfo MODIFY Description varchar2(4000) DEFAULT NULL
ALTER TABLE AD_Sequence_No DROP CONSTRAINT PK122
DROP INDEX PK122
ALTER TABLE AD_Sequence_No ADD CONSTRAINT Sequence_PK PRIMARY KEY (AD_Org_ID, AD_Sequence_ID, CalendarYear)
